Articles.Content:
My personal adviser shakes some sense into me, and says that violence is not the way to go. Therefore I ask for a peace treaty with Zentro. 

Our hill

> 
> 
> 3 hours ago, TheEpicSquared said:
> 
> 
> My personal adviser shakes some sense into me, and says that violence is not the way to go. Therefore I ask for a peace treaty with Zentro. 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Our hill
> 

I accept the peace treaty. [@JoseEduardo](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/127759-joseeduardo/), your call to accept the peace treaty.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-09-17T23:41:22Z" title="09/17/2016 11:41  PM" data-short="7 yr">September 17, 2016</time> by Wildcat111**

Ummmm [@TheEpicSquared](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/158667-theepicsquared/) and [@JoseEduardo](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/127759-joseeduardo/) anybody here?

I leave the current owner(s) of the hill some sugar free gummy bears and they leave the throne due to... medical... reasons.

My hill. Just needs a little cleaning. And a lot of air freshener.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-10-02T15:48:04Z" title="10/02/2016 03:48  PM" data-short="7 yr">October 2, 2016</time> by njmksr**

After visiting my doctor, I take back the hill along with [@Wildcat111](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/165926-wildcat111/) and [@JoseEduardo](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/127759-joseeduardo/)

A doctor can't help you. Nothing but time can help heal the wounds these gelatinous demons have inflicted upon you.

Nonetheless, I utilize my [ACV-270 'Freedomizer'](https://kerbalx.com/njmksr/ACV-270-Freedomizer-Airborne-Weapons-Platform) and shred the hill to smithereens.

No hill.

So I make a new hill and guard it with the various submissions to the AHWP Challenge.

My, [@Adelaar](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/150794-adelaar/)'s, and [@drtricky](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/154647-drtricky/)'s hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-10-02T16:52:41Z" title="10/02/2016 04:52  PM" data-short="7 yr">October 2, 2016</time> by njmksr**

I invade the hill with all the military craft that me, [@TheEpicSquared](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/158667-theepicsquared/) and [@JoseEduardo](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/127759-joseeduardo/) have built. The craft obliterate the AHWP challenge craft, and take the hill. Also, I recover from my medical problems.

OUR. HILL. PERIOD.

> 
> 
> 23 minutes ago, Wildcat111 said:
> 
> 
> I invade the hill with all the military craft that me, [@TheEpicSquared](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/158667-theepicsquared/) and [@JoseEduardo](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/127759-joseeduardo/) have built. The craft obliterate the AHWP challenge craft, and take the hill. Also, I recover from my medical problems.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> OUR. HILL. PERIOD.
> 

I'm sorry, but have you *seen* how heavily armed/armored the AHWPs are? Your puny military is no match for what's essentially mobile military bases!

Your crater, muh hill.

![rocket-launcher.jpg](http://www.wnd.com/files/2015/03/rocket-launcher.jpg)  

your little plane thingy is gone

> 
> 
> 7 minutes ago, JoseEduardo said:
> 
> 
> **little** 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> **little**
> 
> 
> 
> 
> **little**
> 

bruh

Spoiler

![PTbt97b.png](http://i.imgur.com/PTbt97b.png)![RjFOqzu.png](http://i.imgur.com/RjFOqzu.png)

But alright, I'll stop overusing this excuse

I nuke the hill. From orbit.

The hills are no longer alive, with the sound of, well, anything.

I make a hill... UPSIDE DOWN.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-10-02T19:08:54Z" title="10/02/2016 07:08  PM" data-short="7 yr">October 2, 2016</time> by njmksr**

so you have a crater then? interesting...  
  
![clean-drinking-waterl.jpg](https://nepaliaustralian.files.wordpress.com/2012/03/clean-drinking-waterl.jpg)  

ah, and I built a tall wall around it with barbed wire and electrified before filling it with water, just to be sure nothing would get out

I firebomb it, which vaporizes the water and destroys the wall.  I make a bunker.

My crater.
![68?cb=20100909024240](http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/worms/images/7/7b/Super_Bunker_buster_screen.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/68?cb=20100909024240)

Hey, I was invited to a bunker BBQ party...

Anybody here?

Ok then, I guess I'll just grill up some burgers in the rubble if anybody wants to have a party.

My rubble.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-10-02T20:07:53Z" title="10/02/2016 08:07  PM" data-short="7 yr">October 2, 2016</time> by njmksr**

I'll join. I brought a portable hill.

Everyone's hill.

Me, [@JoseEduardo](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/127759-joseeduardo/) and [@TheEpicSquared](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/158667-theepicsquared/) storm the hill with soldiers dressed in Viking uniform. As you can see later, <u>looks are deceiving.</u>

OUR. HILL. PERIOD.

I disregard your punctuation and unleash a litany of curses. Your soldiers can take no more. As I watch them fleeing in disgrace, clutching their ears, the last few curses fall from my lips, unseating the triarchs from their ill-gotten thrones.

My cursed hill.

I send the brazilian police in, they don't give a s\*\*\* about curses  
  
![bope-subindo-o-morro-do-chaves.jpg](https://rio24horas.files.wordpress.com/2009/04/bope-subindo-o-morro-do-chaves.jpg)

I send in the US and Russian armies to aid [@JoseEduardo](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/127759-joseeduardo/)'s troops. The forces of the opponent is overwhelmed by the three armies.

OUR. F\*\*\*ING. HILL.

I find a different hill.

My hill, space available for rent.

I don't like peaceful solutions for war  
  
![ehc0jj.jpg?w=748&h=498&crop=1](https://metrouk2.files.wordpress.com/2015/11/ehc0jj.jpg?w=748&h=498&crop=1)  

our hill again

![Winston-Shield-Projector.jpg](http://overwatch.blizzpro.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/10/2014/11/Winston-Shield-Projector.jpg)

And I lived happily ever after on my hill.

MY PROTECTED HILL.

The shield generator fails after a while (just like seen in that short video), so I storm the hill with my army of bureaucrats on pigs.

I then make BBQ. Don't ask where I got the pork from.

My hill with a BBQ stand.

I buy some barbecue.

My delicious miniature barbecue hill.

> 
> 
> 2 hours ago, RocketSquid said:
> 
> 
> I buy some barbecue.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> My delicious miniature barbecue hill.
> 

Do you want to ally? The Barbecue Hill Coalition!

I join in and bring an awesome soundsystem

**Edited <time datetime="2016-10-03T23:52:08Z" title="10/03/2016 11:52  PM" data-short="7 yr">October 3, 2016</time> by njmksr**
